attributes.action: A call for a vote of no confidence in Jeremy Hunt.
attributes.additional_details: The British Medical Association has also rejected Jeremy Hunts proposals but still he continues with this campaign of injustice, I must remind everyone that we live in a democracy and this kind of cat is unacceptable in our society
attributes.background: Jeremy Hunt has had no respect for the position of Junior Doctors is unwilling to Listen to them, In fact he has quite blatantly disregarded anything they have said and believes that he can ride rough shot over them by forcing them to sign contract.
